foreignKey.disable: DO $$ DECLARE table_name text; BEGIN FOR table_name IN (SELECT tablename FROM pg_tables WHERE schemaname = current_schema()) LOOP EXECUTE 'ALTER TABLE "' || table_name || '" DISABLE TRIGGER ALL;'; END LOOP; END $$;
foreignKey.enable: DO $$ DECLARE table_name text; BEGIN FOR table_name IN (SELECT tablename FROM pg_tables WHERE schemaname = current_schema()) LOOP EXECUTE 'ALTER TABLE "' || table_name || '" ENABLE TRIGGER ALL;'; END LOOP; END $$;

getTables: SELECT table_name AS name FROM information_schema.tables  WHERE table_schema = CURRENT_SCHEMA() AND table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
createTempTable: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE "{{tableName}}_temp" AS SELECT * FROM "{{tableName}}"
getColumnsWithAutoIncrement: SELECT column_name, column_default FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'public' AND column_default LIKE 'nextval%' AND table_name = '{{tableName}}'
